page.title: 10A Message To The Future
page.content: I hope there will be less unemployment in the world in the future although I think there will be more.I also hope that in Ethiopia there will be no famine unlike today.Today thousands of people even young children die of starvation or diseases.A few weeks ago an American T.W.A. plane was hijacked. The hijackers did this because they wanted 324 of their own people back from the Americans and the Israelies. There have been bombs dropped or planted by the I.R.A. They have been doing this because they think that Northern Ireland should be able to have it's own government and not be part of the United Kingdom. I hope that in about 50-100 years everything in our world will be better and it will be a nicer place to live in.
